metadata.title: Life@USTC - Course and Schedule Management
metadata.description: USTC course and schedule management system

subscriptions.title: My Subscriptions
subscriptions.noSubscriptionsDescription: You haven't subscribed to any course sections yet.
subscriptions.linkCopiedDescription: Calendar link has been copied to clipboard

bulkImport.title: Bulk Import Sections
bulkImport.description: Paste text containing section codes (e.g., schedule screenshots, course selection lists). The system will automatically identify and match courses from the current semester.
bulkImport.placeholder: Paste any text containing section codes, e.g.: 001013.01, COMP3001.01, etc.
bulkImport.checkFormat: Please check the input text format
bulkImport.foundSections: Found {count} matching sections. Select the courses to subscribe:

homepage.subtitle: Your all-in-one app for course schedules, campus resources, and student life at USTC
homepage.downloadBadgeAlt: Download Life@USTC on the App Store

browseCourses.title: Browse Courses
browseCourses.description: Explore available courses and find the perfect classes for your schedule

viewSections.title: View Sections
viewSections.description: Check section schedules, instructors, and availability

mySubscriptions.title: My Subscriptions
mySubscriptions.description: Manage your subscribed sections and get calendar links

myProfile.title: Me
myProfile.description: View your profile, subscriptions, and account settings

browseTeachers.title: Browse Teachers
browseTeachers.description: View teacher information and their teaching sections

courseManagement.title: Course Management
courseManagement.description: Browse courses, check schedules, and plan your semester efficiently

smartScheduling.title: Smart Scheduling
smartScheduling.description: Get real-time updates on class schedules and room assignments

stayUpdated.title: Stay Updated
stayUpdated.description: Never miss important announcements and campus events

courses.title: All Courses
courses.subtitle: Browse and search through all available courses
courses.searchPlaceholder: Search by course name or code...

courseDetail.noSections: No sections available for this course

sections.title: All Sections
sections.subtitle: Browse and filter through all available course sections
sections.searchPlaceholder: Search or use advanced syntax (click ? for help)
sections.searchHelpDescription: Use special syntax to search for specific attributes. You can combine multiple filters.

searchHelpExamples.description: Search by exact credit value (alias: credit:number)
Sort results by field (alias: sortby:field). Valid fields: credits, capacity, semester, course, code, teacher, campus
Set sort order: asc (ascending) or desc (descending). Default is asc

sectionDetail.calendarSheetDescription: Copy the link below and subscribe to this calendar in your calendar app
sectionDetail.subscriptionHintLabel: This URL includes all your subscribed sections and auto-syncs
sectionDetail.subscribeSuccessDescription: This section has been added to your subscriptions
sectionDetail.unsubscribeSuccessDescription: This section has been removed from your subscriptions
sectionDetail.loginRequiredDescription: Sign in to subscribe to course sections and sync your calendar across devices.
sectionDetail.noSchedule: No schedule information available for this section
sectionDetail.viewAllSections: View all sections for this course

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Manage your profile settings and account preferences.
profile.editProfileDescription: Make changes to your profile here. Click save when you're done.
profile.name: Name
profile.usernameHint: This is your public display name.
profile.usernameValidation: Lowercase letters and numbers only, max 20 chars
profile.linkedAccountsDescription: Manage your connected accounts for easier login.
profile.disconnectConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to disconnect your {provider} account? You will no longer be able to sign in with this account.
profile.cannotDisconnectLast: You cannot disconnect your only linked account. Connect another account first.
profile.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
profile.deleteAccountConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account, all linked accounts, subscriptions, and remove all your data from our servers.
profile.deleteAccountSuccessDescription: Your account has been permanently deleted.
profile.deleteAccountErrorDescription: Failed to delete account. Please try again.

searchHelp.title: Advanced Search
searchHelp.description: You can use special prefixes to filter your search results more precisely.

examples.teacher: Find courses taught by a specific teacher
examples.campus: Filter by campus (East, West, South, etc.)
examples.credits: Filter by exact number of credits
examples.sort: Sort results by field (credits, capacity, etc.)

signIn.title: Sign In
signIn.description: Choose a provider to sign in to your account
signIn.errorAccountNotLinked: This account is already linked to another user. Please sign in with a different account.
signIn.errorGeneric: An error occurred during sign in. Please try again.
signIn.termsNotice: By signing in, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

teachers.title: All Teachers
teachers.subtitle: Browse and search through all teachers
teachers.name: Name
teachers.viewAllSections: View all sections taught by this teacher
